item.title: Movies Every Physics Student Should Watch
item.description: A list of movies that should be added to the to-watch list Primer The Theory of Everything Hawking Infinity Copenhagen Interstellar Coherence Einstein and Eddington Predestination A Serious Man Contact 2001: A Space Odyssey Gravity Flatland: The Movie October Sky Back To The Future The Martian Marie Curie: More Than Meets the Eye Particle Fever Apollo 13
item.content:
